text: Zvirokwazo, takatumira kudzinza rega-rega mutumwa achiti: “Namatai Allah, mova munosiya Taaghoot (vanamwari venhema).” Uye pakati pavo pane vakatungamirirwa naAllah, uye pakati pavo pane avo kurasika kwange kwakakodzera zvachose. Naizvozvo fambai nenyika muone kuti magumo eavo vakaramba chokwadi akanga akaita sei
